name: Nightmare Games
description:
This game is a short showcase of what you can do with pygame and a little bit of C code.

It was made in less than a week for the Pygame Summer Game Jam 2022.

You can find the source code of the game from the Github page.

This game was originally supposed to be way different and longer, but I'm having exams so I'm not able to work any more on this project. 

It was fun to participate to the game jam though
